### determineCalleeSaves() {#a9eb6f3247260b906218068229b8d5b67}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>void SystemZELFFrameLowering::determineCalleeSaves (<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machinefunction">MachineFunction</a> &amp; MF, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/bitvector">BitVector</a> &amp; SavedRegs, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/regscavenger">RegScavenger</a> &#42; RS) const</>}
  labels = {["virtual"]}>
This method determines which of the registers reported by <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/targetregisterinfo/#ad71b5bc0aa81f5dec06cbfecaf2f7183">TargetRegisterInfo::getCalleeSavedRegs()</a> should actually get saved.

The default implementation checks populates the <code>SavedRegs</code> bitset with all registers which are modified in the function, targets may override this function to save additional registers. This method also sets up the register scavenger ensuring there is a free register or a frameindex available. This method should not be called by any passes outside of PEI, because it may change state passed in by <code>MF</code> and <code>RS</code>. The preferred interface outside PEI is getCalleeSaves.

Declaration at line <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/systemz/systemzframelowering-h/#l00072">72</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/systemz/systemzframelowering-h">SystemZFrameLowering.h</a>, definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/systemz/systemzframelowering-cpp/#l00229">229</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/systemz/systemzframelowering-cpp">SystemZFrameLowering.cpp</a>.
</MemberDefinition>

### getFrameIndexReference() {#a95fac1598df11a84e80e2da098dbe4b3}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>StackOffset SystemZELFFrameLowering::getFrameIndexReference (<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/aarch64/aarch64promoteconstant-cpp/#a90f8350fecae261c25be85d38b451bff">const</a> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machinefunction">MachineFunction</a> &amp; MF, int FI, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/register">Register</a> &amp; FrameReg) const</>}
  labels = {["virtual"]}>
getFrameIndexReference - This method should return the base register and offset used to reference a frame index location.

Returns the displacement from the frame register to the stack frame of the specified index, along with the frame register used (in output arg FrameReg).

The offset is returned directly, and the base register is returned via FrameReg.

This is the default implementation which is overridden for some targets.

Declaration at line <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/systemz/systemzframelowering-h/#l00089">89</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/systemz/systemzframelowering-h">SystemZFrameLowering.h</a>, definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/systemz/systemzframelowering-cpp/#l00839">839</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/systemz/systemzframelowering-cpp">SystemZFrameLowering.cpp</a>.
</MemberDefinition>

### orderFrameObjects() {#a420e13f932ebcdd50a90e807d5e5674f}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>void SystemZELFFrameLowering::orderFrameObjects (<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/aarch64/aarch64promoteconstant-cpp/#a90f8350fecae261c25be85d38b451bff">const</a> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machinefunction">MachineFunction</a> &amp; MF, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/smallvectorimpl">SmallVectorImpl</a>&lt; int &gt; &amp; objectsToAllocate) const</>}
  labels = {["virtual"]}>
Order the symbols in the local stack frame.

The list of objects that we want to order is in <code>objectsToAllocate</code> as indices into the <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machineframeinfo">MachineFrameInfo</a>. The array can be reordered in any way upon return. The contents of the array, however, may not be modified (i.e. only their order may be changed). By default, just maintain the original order.

Declaration at line <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/systemz/systemzframelowering-h/#l00092">92</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/systemz/systemzframelowering-h">SystemZFrameLowering.h</a>, definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/systemz/systemzframelowering-cpp/#l00083">83</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/systemz/systemzframelowering-cpp">SystemZFrameLowering.cpp</a>.
</MemberDefinition>

### processFunctionBeforeFrameFinalized() {#ae45b5d3065cf62a7eac0053f27cb8103}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>void SystemZELFFrameLowering::processFunctionBeforeFrameFinalized (<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machinefunction">MachineFunction</a> &amp; MF, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/regscavenger">RegScavenger</a> &#42; RS) const</>}
  labels = {["virtual"]}>
processFunctionBeforeFrameFinalized - This method is called immediately before the specified function&#39;s frame layout (MF.getFrameInfo()) is finalized.

Once the frame is finalized, MO&#95;FrameIndex operands are replaced with direct constants. This method is optional.

Declaration at line <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/systemz/systemzframelowering-h/#l00083">83</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/systemz/systemzframelowering-h">SystemZFrameLowering.h</a>, definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/systemz/systemzframelowering-cpp/#l00429">429</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/systemz/systemzframelowering-cpp">SystemZFrameLowering.cpp</a>.

### restoreCalleeSavedRegisters() {#a15d74c0d6159ac707f99c91219d0c6a5}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>bool SystemZELFFrameLowering::restoreCalleeSavedRegisters (<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machinebasicblock">MachineBasicBlock</a> &amp; MBB, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machinebasicblock/#ae34c996b58df9b9ce6695a0c8b70c533">MachineBasicBlock::iterator</a> MI, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/mutablearrayref">MutableArrayRef</a>&lt; <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/calleesavedinfo">CalleeSavedInfo</a> &gt; CSI, <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/aarch64/aarch64promoteconstant-cpp/#a90f8350fecae261c25be85d38b451bff">const</a> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/targetregisterinfo">TargetRegisterInfo</a> &#42; TRI) const</>}
  labels = {["virtual"]}>
restoreCalleeSavedRegisters - Issues instruction(s) to restore all callee saved registers and returns true if it isn&#39;t possible / profitable to do so by issuing a series of load instructions via loadRegToStackSlot().

If it returns true, and any of the registers in CSI is not restored, it sets the corresponding Restored flag in CSI to false. Returns false otherwise.

Declaration at line <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/systemz/systemzframelowering-h/#l00079">79</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/systemz/systemzframelowering-h">SystemZFrameLowering.h</a>, definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/systemz/systemzframelowering-cpp/#l00373">373</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/systemz/systemzframelowering-cpp">SystemZFrameLowering.cpp</a>.
</MemberDefinition>

### spillCalleeSavedRegisters() {#ac0e549bf3d7f691714f73696c1df480c}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>bool SystemZELFFrameLowering::spillCalleeSavedRegisters (<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machinebasicblock">MachineBasicBlock</a> &amp; MBB, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machinebasicblock/#ae34c996b58df9b9ce6695a0c8b70c533">MachineBasicBlock::iterator</a> MI, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/arrayref">ArrayRef</a>&lt; <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/calleesavedinfo">CalleeSavedInfo</a> &gt; CSI, <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/aarch64/aarch64promoteconstant-cpp/#a90f8350fecae261c25be85d38b451bff">const</a> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/targetregisterinfo">TargetRegisterInfo</a> &#42; TRI) const</>}
  labels = {["virtual"]}>
spillCalleeSavedRegisters - Issues instruction(s) to spill all callee saved registers and returns true if it isn&#39;t possible / profitable to do so by issuing a series of store instructions via storeRegToStackSlot().

Returns false otherwise.
